quote: Cocktails are society's most enduring invention.
author: Elsa Maxwell

quote: If live gives you limes, make Margaritas.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: A penny saved is a cocktail earned.
It's beginning to look a lot like cocktails!
A cocktail done right can really show your guests that you care.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: A cocktail can be made by the bartender. But the cocktail also can be made by the chef.
author: Jose Andres

quote: There is something urbane, stylish, and worldly about owning a cocktail shaker.
author: Roger Stone

quote: Your cocktail shaker can be smooth chrome or hammered aluminum. It must both conduct cold and look sophisticated at the same time.
author: Roger Stone

quote: I don't think 'Cocktail' was a perfect critical success, but it touched a vein in our culture.
author: Elisabeth Shue

quote: In the 1930s, anyone of any sophisticated status owned a cocktail shaker. Distinctive ones are easy to find.
author: Roger Stone

quote: We had cocktail parties and I'd stay up until 5 in the morning.
author: Dorothy Malone

quote: The really important things are said over cocktails and are never done.
author: Peter F. Drucker
